alert.note: Alert for City of Norton; Lee; Scott; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 9:20PM EDT until June 11 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lee County in southwestern Virginia... The City of Norton in southwestern Virginia... Central Scott County in southwestern Virginia... Southwestern Wise County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 920 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pennington Gap, or 10 miles northeast of Jonesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Norton, Wise, Big Stone Gap, Pennington Gap, Appalachia, St. Charles, Duffield, Jasper, Fort Blackmore and Dryden. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Norton; Lee; Scott; Wise
